environments.name: Deployment Environment Name (eg. Production)
environments.cacert: Swarm Manager ca certificate in base 64 encoded form for specified Environment (ca.pem).
environments.cert: Swarm Manager cert certificate in base 64 encoded form for specified Environment (cert.pem)
environments.key: Swarm Manager key certificate in base 64 encoded form for specified Environment (key.pem)
